Text:
Unlike zakimar (which is Iranian for "child molester"), I agree with kimm. Some idiots can't fathom the importance of categories, and post their crap everywhere. Frankly, if you are that lazy/stupid/illiterate, please stay off the internet. Maybe play some more with your own feces, or maybe bang your momma once more.

By the way, the same goes for you zakamir, you extremist piece of shit!
